title: Apocalypse
description: The Joneses plan for Edenia and Miriam is far more intense than Seth bargained for. Can Seth really take vengeance of this kind, on Miriam?Miriam hopes she will not regret the trust she's put in Seth because if she loses him, she might just lose her faith.Peter senses the Guardians have a bigger task than just keeping Immortality safe from the world, but until he makes peace with his nemesis, he won't figure out how his unique Nature plays a role.In the second book of the Guardians series, the Edenians will fight to save seven thousand years of secrets as they wade into the chaos of the Apocalypse.
author: Theresa Pocock
